      Initializes a new hero with the given name, maximum hitpoints, protection and a variable amount of objects.

    • Uses of Item in rpg.item

      Classes in rpg.item that implement Item 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Armor
      A class of armors Armors are a special type of itemimplementation, involving aditionally a maximum value and a protection
      class  BackPack
      A class of backpacks A backpack is a special type of container
      class  Container
      An abstract class of containers.
      class  Dukat
      A class of dukats involving an id, value and weight.
      class  ItemImplementation
      A class, involving an id, a weight, a backpack, a parent and a value
      class  Purse
      A class of purses.
      class  Weapon
      A Weapon is a special type of ItemImplementation involving additionally a damage
